Name: Rome Defenders - The First Wave
About the game: Support the brave Romans and face the terrible creatures from the deepest gates of the underworld! Dare a stroke of genius in Rome Defenders - The First Wave and combine tactical thinking with exciting and unique action! Start with just a few weapons to defend your camp against a host of attackers. Constantly update your arsenal of weapons as the game progresses! Attention: The attackers also learn and arm themselves so that their expulsion becomes more and more difficult. Your survival depends solely on your ability to expand and place your weapons systems and towers. Strategic skills and tactical thinking are advantageous. Minotaurs, skeletons, flying monsters and evil spirits will not be the only enemies to challenge your garrison. Enjoy exciting action in this thrilling defense game! Features: - Exciting defensive game where skill and tactics are required. - Many different defenders, opponents and upgrades - Shop for the purchase of important extras against stars played - Almanac with information about each warrior and defender - trophy chamber - Casual Mode
